answers.answer: Hey! I have this problem too. People told me that I had a yeast problem & I said "no way" because I thought yeast meant vaginal problems, which I do not have.  I did not yeast can be thru-out your body.  any way, for me, & only as a suggestion for you, I use SolarRay yeast-cleanse which you can buy at most vitamin shoppes but if you find it works for you let me know & I will look up where I buy mine for a 1/2 the price.  Good Luck.Samishads

Thanks that's good to know.  Right now it's under control, but I have diabetes also as a result of my PCP overdosing me on Antibiotics and prednisone.  I can never ever take penicillin or prednisone unless my life depends on it.

question: http://www.bodyecology.com/ and http://www.yeastinfectionadvisor.com/ are 2 of the best web-sites, I've found dealing with Candida.  They have saved my life.This discussion is related to/posts/show/206199.
title: Candida help
